name: Credit Scoring Model
description: Machine learning model for automated credit risk assessment. Uses historical financial data to predict loan default probability and assign credit scores to applicants.
training_data_description: Historical loan application data from 2018-2023, including applicant demographics, financial history, and loan outcomes. Approximately 500,000 records from banking partners.
known_limitations: Model may underperform for thin-file applicants with limited credit history
Training data primarily from urban areas, may not generalize well to rural populations
Does not account for recent income changes not yet reflected in credit reports
prohibited_uses: Sole decision-maker for loan denial without human review
Use for purposes other than credit assessment
Sharing of individual scores with third parties
